mainText:
So sad to hear this news, I literally got home from work and jumped  
back on my home computer and once the apple website came up I heard  
this sad news. I have been working with his visionary products for the  
past 20 years and certainly remember my first MAC computer, that was  
released in 1984. I was designing some layouts for a brochure and it  
was pure magic and certainly something new to discover and learn. I  
have been a loyal follower ever since.

My condolences to his family, and may he rest in peace.
author: Tony
